concept.title: Managing app settings
concept.shortdesc: Tap the Menu icon and then Settings to display the application settings. Your settings persist at the server so they are maintained across installs and other mobile devices you may use.

row.entry: Set whether or not to show offline contacts in your contact list.
System messages inform the user of one-time events such as users entering and leaving group chats. This setting is off by default. Turn it on if you wish to see messages displayed.
With this setting ON, once the app has been configured it automatically logs in whenever the app starts from the application icon.
Set the length of time you want to remain online when you put the app in the background.
